comment: It certainly doesn't help that calc II is a hard class... they couldn't find anyone else to teach it? Lectures have few examples, and he's allergic to answering a question properly. My first B in college thanks to this guy, and yes I'm bitter. You can do better with a better prof.

comment: I ran into many personal struggles throughout the semester I took his course, but Prof made time and truly supported and helped me. I couldn't have passed this course without him!

I've seen a lot of bad ratings about Indrei from different schools and I really don't get it. His tests are the easiest ones to prepare for because he uploads a practice set with the same if not similar problem types. He obviously really cares about his students and even had us give feedback on how he could improve. It's not an easy class, its calc

Dr. Indrei is not a bad person, but he seems indifferent to helping you learn the material for this course. In lecture, he goes on tangents barely or not related to the tests/homework, speeding past points of confusion. If you go to office hours you will leave more confused than you came in. Avoid him unless you can teach yourself for this course.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Test heavy
